QuestData.Title: The Warsong Threat
QuestData.Description: <The attack plans are scrawled onto the parchment in thick, black ink and bound in rough leather.>$b$bTo all outrider stations:$b$bThe warlord has commanded that all outriders prepare for a full assault upon the Horde invaders in our land. Plans for the attack have been delivered to several of the remote outrider posts.$b$bBlood and glory shall be ours as we trample the Horde invaders beneath our feet!$b$bThe warlord commands and the Warsong obey! Lok'tar ogar!
QuestData.RewardText: <Blood Guard Ehanes looks over the attack plans.>$b$bHmm... I see. You have done well to retrieve these attack plans. With the plans in our hands, we will be more than prepared to counter the assault when it comes.
